history.proof: intros s1 s2 x H1 H2. unfold set_minus. induction s1. - reflexivity. - destruct (exds_dec s2 x) as [H|H]. + shelve. + rewrite IHs1. * shelve. * shelve.

ctx: intros s1 s2 x H1 H2.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (s1 s2 : set) (x : dart), ~ exds s1 x -> exds s2 x -> set_minus s1 (Ds s2 x) = set_minus s1 s2

Premises:
set_minus = fix set_minus (s1 s2 : set) {struct s1} : set := match s1 with | Vs => Vs | Is s0 x => if exds_dec s2 x then set_minus s0 s2 else Is (set_minus s0 s2) x end : set -> set -> set
exds = fix exds (s : set) (z : dart) {struct s} : Prop := match s with | Vs => False | Is s0 x => x = z \/ exds s0 z end : set -> dart -> Prop
Inductive set : Set := Vs : set | Is : set -> dart -> set
Ds = fix Ds (s : set) (z : dart) {struct s} : set := match s with | Vs => Vs | Is s0 x => if eq_dart_dec x z then Ds s0 z else Is (Ds s0 z) x end : set -> dart -> set
dart = nat : Set
exds_set_minus : forall (s1 s2 : set) (z : dart), exds s1 z -> ~ exds s2 z -> exds (set_minus s1 s2) z
incls_rec : forall (s1 s2 : set) (P : Set), ((forall z : dart, exds s1 z -> exds s2 z) -> P) -> incls s1 s2 -> P
incls_ind : forall (s1 s2 : set) (P : Prop), ((forall z : dart, exds s1 z -> exds s2 z) -> P) -> incls s1 s2 -> P
incls_rect : forall (s1 s2 : set) (P : Type), ((forall z : dart, exds s1 z -> exds s2 z) -> P) -> incls s1 s2 -> P
not_exds_set_minus : forall (s1 s2 : set) (z : dart), exds s2 z -> ~ exds (set_minus s1 s2) z
exds2 : forall s1 s2 : set, (forall z : dart, exds s1 z -> exds s2 z) -> incls s1 s2
exds_set_minus_eq : forall (s1 s2 : set) (z : dart), exds s1 z /\ ~ exds s2 z < -> exds (set_minus s1 s2) z
not_exds_minus : forall (s1 s2 : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s1 z -> ~ exds (set_minus s1 s2) z
Inductive incls (s1 s2 : set) : Prop := exds2 : (forall z : dart, exds s1 z -> exds s2 z) -> incls s1 s2 For exds2: Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
not_exds_Ds_bis : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), ~ exds s z -> ~ exds (Ds s x) z
exds_Ds : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), x <> z -> exds s z < -> exds (Ds s x) z
exds_Ds_diff : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), exds (Ds s x) z -> x <> z
exds_Ds_exds : forall (s : set) (x z : dart), exds (Ds s x) z -> exds s z
not_exds_card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z -> card (Ds s z) = card s
not_exds_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds (Ds s z) z
exds_card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> card (Ds s z) = (card s - 1)%nat
not_exds_diff : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z -> forall t : dart, exds s t -> z <> t
exds_card_Ds_inf : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> (card (Ds s z) < card s)%nat
Ds_s : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z < -> Ds s z = s
exds_card_pos : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> (0 < card s)%nat
not_exds_Vs : forall s : set, (forall z : dart, ~ exds s z) -> s = Vs
not_exd_D : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd (D m x) x
B_1_not_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m x -> B_1 m k x = m
B_not_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m x -> B m k x = m
cA_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z
cA_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z
top_top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ pred m k y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = y
bottom_bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ succ m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = y
cA_cA_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z
exds_dec : forall (s : set) (z : dart), {exds s z} + {~ exds s z}
A_1_B_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> A_1 (B_1 m k x) k x = nil
A_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> A (B m k x) k x = nil
A_1_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A_1 m k x = y -> cA_1 m k x = y
A_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A m k x = y -> cA m k x = y
prec_I = fun (m : fmap) (x : dart) => x <> nil /\ ~ exd m x : fmap -> dart -> Prop
A_1_B_1_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> x -> A_1 (B_1 m k x) k y = A_1 m k y
B_1_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> B_1 m k x = B m k (A_1 m k x)
top_top_bottom_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y
bottom_bottom_top_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = top m k y
A_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A m k x -> A_1 (B m k x) k y = A_1 m k y

``` 
intros s1 s2 x H1 H2.
unfold set_minus.
induction s1.
- reflexivity.
- simpl.
  destruct (exds_dec s2 x) as [H|H].
  + apply IHs1.
  + simpl.
    rewrite IHs1.
    reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros s1 s2 x H1 H2. unfold set_minus. induction s1. - reflexivity. - simpl. destruct (exds_dec s2 x) as [H|H]. + apply IHs1. + simpl. rewrite IHs1. reflexivity.
